/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, adding a human element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the scene.
